We Represent Families Who Have Lost Loved Ones In Tragic Auto Accidents

The realization that a loved one won’t be coming home after a fatal car crash is a reality that most people will never understand. The attorneys at Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, however, understand what families are going through.

Our Columbus attorneys have been representing families in wrongful death lawsuits for 50 years. While we can’t bring your loved one back, we will do everything we can to obtain compensation for your loved one’s suffering and your family’s ongoing emotional and financial hardships:

  • We will work hard to obtain compensation for your family’s grief, loss of emotional support from the decedent, loss of household services, and the loss of guidance and education for minor children.
  • We will work with economists to identify the long-term financial loss to the family due to the loss of a primary breadwinner.
  • We will work with specialists to establish the nature of your loved one’s pain and suffering prior to his or her death.
  • We will calculate final medical expenses and funeral expenses that should be paid.

Working With One Of Central Ohio’s Premier Legal Teams

If a loved one has died in a rollover accident, motorcycle crash or any other fatal motor vehicle accident, you can count on our law firm to provide the experienced legal counsel you need in holding negligent parties accountable and throughout the probate court process.

You will be working with one of central Ohio’s most proven legal teams. We hope that will give you peace of mind and allow you to focus on recovering from what has happened.

Get Our Support Today

We invite you to call to schedule a free consultation today with a lawyer from our office. There are no legal fees unless we recover compensation for you.

You can reach us by email or call us at 614-360-2706.
